    • Method Detail

      • registerEventValue

        public static <T,E extends org.bukkit.event.Event> void registerEventValue(java.lang.Class<E> e,
                                                           java.lang.Class<T> c,
                                                           Getter<T,E> g,
                                                           int time)
        Registers an event value.
        Parameters:
        e - the event type
        c - the type of the default value
        g - the getter to get the value
        time - -1 if this is the value before the event, 1 if after, and 0 if it's the default or this value doesn't have distinct states. Always register a default state! You can leave out one of the other states instead, e.g. only register a default and a past state. The future state will default to the default state in this case.

      • getEventValue

        @Nullable
public static <T,E extends org.bukkit.event.Event> T getEventValue(E e,
                                                            java.lang.Class<T> c,
                                                            int time)
        Gets a specific value from an event. Returns null if the event doesn't have such a value (conversions are done to try and get the desired value).

        It is recommended to use getEventValueGetter(Class, Class, int) or EventValueExpression.EventValueExpression(Class) instead of invoking this method repeatedly.

        Parameters:
        e -
        c -
        time -
        Returns:
        The event's value
        See Also:
        registerEventValue(Class, Class, Getter, int)

      • getEventValueGetter

        @Nullable
public static final <T,E extends org.bukkit.event.Event> Getter<? extends T,? super E> getEventValueGetter(java.lang.Class<E> e,
                                                                                              java.lang.Class<T> c,
                                                                                              int time)
        Returns a getter to get a value from an event.

        Can print an error if the event value is blocked for the given event.

        Parameters:
        e -
        c -
        time -
        Returns:
        A getter to get values for a given type of events
        See Also:
        registerEventValue(Class, Class, Getter, int), EventValueExpression.EventValueExpression(Class)
